p: HaCaT keratinocytes were purchased from AddexBio (San Diego, CA, USA). Melanoma cells A375 were obtained from Sigma-Aldrich Co. (St. Louis, MO, USA). Melanoma cells C32 and normal human skin fibroblasts CCD25Sk were purchased from American Type Culture Collection (ATCC; Manassas, VA, USA). The cells were maintained in DMEM (PAN-Biotech GmbH, Aidenbach, Germany) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (Gibco FBS; ThermoFisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA) and 1% penicillin/streptomycin (ThermoFisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA) at 37 Â°C in a 5% CO 2 incubator.
